properties.entry: SELECT MANAGER_NO, MANAGER_ID, MANAGER_PWD, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_PHONE, MANAGER_EMAIL, STATUS FROM TB_MANAGER WHERE MANAGER_ID = ? AND MANAGER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ROWNUM , PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME || ' ' || CAPACITY || '(mL/g)' PRODUCT_NAME , STOCK FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND STOCK < 10 ORDER BY STOCK

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT ORDER_NO , PAYMENT_DATE , MEMBER_ID , O.STATUS FROM TB_ORDER O JOIN TB_PAYMENT USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
